QuestData.Title: Teddies and Tea
QuestData.Description: There's nobody to play with here anymore. But you'll play with me, right $gmister:lady;?$b$bIt's time for tea! Help me find the other guests, please!
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather Mr. Munchykins, Trunksy, and Mayor Striggs for the tea party.
QuestData.CompletionText: This is going to be the best tea party ever!
QuestData.RewardText: Hooray! Only one more guest left to find.
